changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder, if there is no information on the update, it is because it concerns only the update of documentation, translation or text

index.md.Ce plugin permet d'allumer ou d'eteindre: This plugin allows you to turn on or off the light according to the presence of a person and the exterior light
index.md.Il est capable de gerer la temporisation: It is able to manage the delay following the absence of movement
index.md.Il gere aussi la notion de debryage pour: It also manages the concept of debryage so as not to turn off the light too early if you have turned it on manually and there is no movement
index.md.Le plugin n'a aucun configuration spécif: The plugin has no specific configuration
index.md.C'est ici que vous definisez le nom de l: This is where you define the name of the equipment, whether it is active or not, the visibility
index.md.Ici, il faut donner la commande pour all: Here you have to give the command to turn on the light, to turn it off and to know the status
index.md.Ce plugin ne marche que avec les lumière: This plugin only works with lights having binary status feedback (on or off
index.md.Là, vous définissez vos détecteurs de mo: There you define your motion detectors, you can have as many as you want
index.md.Vous mettez votre capteur de luminosité: You put your light sensor and the threshold to turn on the light
index.md.Il est possible d'en mettre plusieurs: It is possible to put several
index.md.Dans ce cas, si l'un des détecteurs tomb: In this case, if one of the detectors falls below the threshold value then the light will turn on during movement
index.md.Vous pouvez aussi demander au plugin de: You can also ask the plugin to retrieve the minimum value of the brightness over the last X minutes, be careful in this case it is absolutely necessary that the brightness control is logged
index.md.Définir le délai d'extinction lorsqu'il: Set the switch-off delay when there is no more movement
index.md.Activer ou non le débrayage si la lumièr: Activate or not the disengagement if the light is not in the expected state (someone turned it on
index.md.Le délai avant la reprise en main de la: The time before the plugin takes over the management of light
index.md.Pour les 2 derniers paramètres, le cas e: For the last 2 parameters, the case is quite simple
index.md.quelqu'un allume la lumière passe devant: someone turns on the light passes in front of the detector then leaves, after XX seconds the detector returns the information that there is no one there, then after 1 minute (in my case) the plugin should turn off the light
index.md.Avec le débrayage, le plugin ne va rien: With the disengagement, the plugin will do nothing and wait 5 minutes before resuming automatic management and turning off the light. </p
